name: vocalith
description: Modern Text-to-Speech application with AI-powered natural voices

scripts.download-models: export VIRTUAL_ENV=$PWD/coqui-env-py311 && $PWD/coqui-env-py311/bin/tts --list_models && $PWD/coqui-env-py311/bin/tts --text "Test" --model_name tts_models/en/ljspeech/glow-tts --out_path test_ljspeech.wav && $PWD/coqui-env-py311/bin/tts --text "Test" --model_name tts_models/en/vctk/vits --speaker_idx p273 --out_path test_vctk.wav && $PWD/coqui-env-py311/bin/tts --text "Test" --model_name tts_models/en/jenny/jenny --out_path test_jenny.wav
scripts.download-models-win: set VIRTUAL_ENV=%CD%\coqui-env-py311 && %CD%\coqui-env-py311\Scripts\tts --list_models && %CD%\coqui-env-py311\Scripts\tts --text "Test" --model_name tts_models/en/ljspeech/glow-tts --out_path test_ljspeech.wav && %CD%\coqui-env-py311\Scripts\tts --text "Test" --model_name tts_models/en/vctk/vits --speaker_idx p273 --out_path test_vctk.wav && %CD%\coqui-env-py311\Scripts\tts --text "Test" --model_name tts_models/en/jenny/jenny --out_path test_jenny.wav

author: Shreenidhi (https://github.com/shreenxdhi)
